title: Ichiban
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This Japanese restaurants offers a vegetarian miso soup without bonito (fish). Staff is aware of vegetarian requirements. There is a separate vegetarian/vegan section on the menu; has rolls inari (tofu) and a Mr. Bean roll, which is wrapped in bean curd rather than seaweed and filled. Tranquil atmosphere with booths and tatami rooms. Vegan dessert options include a sorbet.
